title: Lodul
data:
***Version [0.30](/0.30 "0.30")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

*For a list of all ogres, see [list of ogres](/List_of_ogres "List of ogres").*

| Lodul O [![Lodul.png](/images/0/03/Lodul.png)](/File:Lodul.png) |                                                                                                                                                                                       |

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| - | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | An ogre emissary of the Ironbound Order, sent to find and stop intruders before they enter the Vaults. Fiercely charismatic, he's rallied a small army of his kin, overawing them with the long-range lightning array he wears on his back. (The large coin purse he took from the Vaults is also quite persuasive.) |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Location](#Location)
- [3 Spells](#Spells)
- [4 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [5 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Lodul the Thundrous** is a [unique](/Unique "Unique") [ogre](/Ogre_\(monster\) "Ogre (monster)") with the same [Call Down Lightning](/Call_Down_Lightning "Call Down Lightning") of an [ironbound thunderhulk](/Ironbound_thunderhulk "Ironbound thunderhulk"), albeit not as strong. He spawns with a pack of [ogres](/Ogre "Ogre") and a fair sum of [gold](/Gold "Gold").

## Location

- [Dungeon](/Dungeon "Dungeon"): 10-14

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                                          |                                                      |
| :---------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ---------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Call Down Lightning](/Call_Down_Lightning "Call Down Lightning") (3d15) | [Magical flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- See [ironbound thunderhulk](/Ironbound_thunderhulk "Ironbound thunderhulk"), except that he lacks [blink](/Blink "Blink"), making it easier to get up past his effective range.
- You aren't likely to have a source of antimagic at this point in the game, and both [Silence](/Silence "Silence") and the [phial of floods](/Phial_of_floods "Phial of floods") don't work against mechanical magic. A [potion of resistance](/Potion_of_resistance "Potion of resistance") at least can lower the damage.
- His [willpower](/Willpower "Willpower") matches that of a [two-headed ogre](/Two-headed_ogre "Two-headed ogre"). A [wand of polymorph](/Wand_of_polymorph "Wand of polymorph") most likely will create a non-threatening monster with his 6 HD.

## History

- Lodul was introduced in [0.29](/0.29 "0.29").
html:
Lodul

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.30: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
For a list of all ogres, see list of ogres.
Lodul O 
HP 46-94
HD 6
XP 748
Speed 10 (atk: 150%)
AC 3
EV 7
Will 40
Attack1 30 (hit: plain)


Resistances None
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Weapons & armour
Starting equipment
Open doors
Holiness Natural
Size Large
Type ogre, ogre
Flags Speaks
Warm-blooded
Unique
Male
An ogre emissary of the Ironbound Order, sent to find and stop intruders before they enter the Vaults. Fiercely charismatic, he's rallied a small army of his kin, overawing them with the long-range lightning array he wears on his back. (The large coin purse he took from the Vaults is also quite persuasive.)

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Location
  • 3 Spells
  • 4 Tips & Tricks
  • 5 History

Useful Info

Lodul the Thundrous is a unique ogre with the same Call Down Lightning of an ironbound thunderhulk, albeit not as strong. He spawns with a pack of ogres and a fair sum of gold.

Location

  • Dungeon: 10-14

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Call Down Lightning (3d15) Magical flag

Tips & Tricks

  • See ironbound thunderhulk, except that he lacks blink, making it easier to get up past his effective range.
  • You aren't likely to have a source of antimagic at this point in the game, and both Silence and the phial of floods don't work against mechanical magic. A potion of resistance at least can lower the damage.
  • His willpower matches that of a two-headed ogre. A wand of polymorph most likely will create a non-threatening monster with his 6 HD.

History

  • Lodul was introduced in 0.29.
Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Lodul&oldid=73773"

rawPage:
{{version030}}{{list of|ogres}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Lodul the Thundrous''' is a [[unique]] [[ogre (monster)|ogre]] with the same [[Call Down Lightning]] of an [[ironbound thunderhulk]], albeit not as strong. He spawns with a pack of [[ogre]]s and a fair sum of [[gold]].

==Location==
*[[Dungeon]]: 10-14

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*See [[ironbound thunderhulk]], except that he lacks [[blink]], making it easier to get up past his effective range.
*You aren't likely to have a source of antimagic at this point in the game, and both [[Silence]] and the [[phial of floods]] don't work against mechanical magic. A [[potion of resistance]] at least can lower the damage.
*His [[willpower]] matches that of a [[two-headed ogre]]. A [[wand of polymorph]] most likely will create a non-threatening monster with his 6 HD.

==History==
*Lodul was introduced in [[0.29]].
